main event: Several unidentified objects were sighted over Akron, Ohio on January 6, 1961.
interesting points: The objects were described as round or oval shaped and emitted a bright orange-yellow color,The objects were traveling at a high rate of speed and were observed for approximately 15 minutes,Attempts to identify the objects through visual observation and radar tracking were unsuccessful,No aircraft were reported in the area at the time of the sighting,The sighting occurred under clear weather conditions with good visibility.
sighted object: unidentified round or oval shaped objects emitting bright orange-yellow color
